评论详情: Very cute dress with flamingos print. Looked so pretty on my 5-yr-old niece. She loved it and felt so femenine in it.
This dress is adorable. It fits my niece perfect. And it’s not too, revealing for a sleeveless dress. The colors are perfectly vibrant not overdone. The pattern is just so nice.

We originally purchased this dress for my daughter to wear as a "dress-up" option for Belle, however she refuses to take it off.  It is true to size, a comfortable material and is an appropriate length.
Would not stay on my baby’s shoulders very annoying
Very pretty vibrant dress. Very nice quality too.
My granddaughter is into twirly dresses, and this made her very happy.
Soft cute and Correct sizing.
This little dress is absolutely beautiful the pop of color so cheerful and nicely made quality perfect! Definitely recommend, would buy again.
One time wear
The shoulder strap was torn. Stain and holes on the side.  My packaging was discarded. How May I return?
Loved it the straps were a little big on my daughter but I was able to fix it. She loves wearing the dress its soft.
Granddaughter loved her mermaid dress!
Love the material and fit on my 3 year old.
Fits as expected, cute, comfy, easy to clean
Very cute dress for girls.  This does run a little big and stretches.  Should work for this summer and next summer.
I bought 2 of this dress for my granddaughters, they are beautiful, and they are so soft, the fit perfectly!
Perfect comfortable summer dress!
Absolutely loved this dress on my daughter it was perfect for her 5th birthday. She’s a bit sensory sensitive when it comes to clothes but she loves it. Great quality
So pretty and so so soft! A new favorite dress for my daughter
My daughter needed a yellow dress & boom great price & delivered to my front door.
love it perfect fit
Just such a pretty little dress
Bought this for my daughter in size 7/8 it was true to size. The dress is made from good materials and is well made. It has held up from her playing around in it. Would definitely buy again.
Poor quality, immediately had a hole after 2 wears
Toddler loves it! She calls it a princess dress. The fabric and soft and silky, the colors are vibrant, and the fit is perfect. I bought this in two colors/patterns!
This is a super cute dress! The fabric, design and pattern is great. My daughter loves it.
I like how is look and fit in my daughter
I bought two because I have twin granddaughters. So I bought in two colors. Both girls loved them! Fit true to size. Good quality. Fast shipping.

This dress is perfect and it will last your kid a long time even when you think they’ve outgrown it.  The sleeves are a comfy width so they can grow in it, the material is sooo soft and comfy, the length is perfect even when ordered a size up, the colors are so pretty.  Added bonus, when you order one with a busy pattern, stains just kinda… blend in lol. (5year old).  We ordered M and it fits perfect with room to grow
Absolutely loved everything about this dress! My daughter loves it too! So comfortable and cute!! Great material too! Definitely buy it!

I was worried that it was short but it hit my daughter’s knee .  I bought a size up and it is perfect for her.  The navy blue is bright and true.  Fabric is not at all thin .  I like it and can’t wait to wash and have her wear it. Hopefully it does not shrink in the wash

The dress is cute but I was surprised at how big it was. I bought sizes 5-6 & 8 for my granddaughters to wear for Easter. The size 5 looked more like an 8 and the 8 more like 10. So if you buy this dress, get a least a size smaller. I guess they'll wear them eventually but they'll have to grow into them

I bought the flamingo dress which was advertised as a 95% cotton / 5% spandex blend, however when I received it, it was 95% polyester / 5% spandex. I was so disappointed because I specifically looked at fabric type before purchasing. Not only was it not the right fabric, it had an awful smell and was 'plasticity' feeling even though some poly/spandex blends are soft. There's no way the fabric would breathe well. Absolutely returning. I'm a careful buyer on Amazon and am rarely disappointed with what I receive, but this was an exceptionally bad purchase.
Adorable summer dress, good quality

Adorable little dress for our flamingo loving tot. Ran slightly large on top; tied a pink ribbon in back to keep the straps in place. Soft, and flowing... Passes the spin test! Tots favorite dress this summer.
Great dress for the first day of school. Super soft knot fabric and awesome spin/twirl factor.
First impression, much better quality than I expected. I loved the fabric, it was so soft.  My daughter wore it for her flamingo themed birthday party.  It was perfect.
Everything fit
I got this as a gift to a little girl who is the daughter of a co-worker.  She loves pink and unicorns.  She was so happy to see it and loved how soft it was.  I am so glad that I found it.
I bought this for my 3 year old great granddaughter,  and she lived it. Fit well, was very soft.
Very well made, beautiful fabric, looks lovely on granddaughter!
Fabric is a little cheap. It is thin and looks like it will pull up after a few washes. But the dress is adorable.
We love it . It is very nice.
Really nice gift and the price is right!
This dress is adorable.
Me gusto mucho talla 5/6 para niña de 6 años

This dress for my two year old perfectly. It is made of a decent weight jersey and constructed well. No loose threads or anything like that. The neckline comes up high enough that it's not right under her chin but not too low. The back is cut lower with elastic running across accommodate growth. I really love this and am hoping she wears this for a long time!

评论概述: You get what you paid for.
评论详情: Ordered this dress because it Was affordable. You definitely get what you paid for. After the second wash the seam is coming apart. I rated a 3 because the print was cute and fit nicely.
Love the dress fits perfect.
Love these dresses! The material is so soft yet still lightweight enough for hot summers. It’s a favorite
The colors are vibrant, the material is so so soft and it just looks absolutely adorable!! Fit was true to size and its stretchy.
Purchased this dress for my granddaughter. She loves the print. Does not wrinkle. Promptly delivered.
